reviewText: The best marriage study I have ever used.  Couples in our church are being greatly ministered to!  BUY IT!
Wonderful and marriage changing! I have read and watched dozens of Christian marriage books and videos. This series is hands down the most practical and life changing. Thank you!

The book was better than this material. I loved the book, which is why I bought this curriculum, but it wasn't nearly as good material wise.
I'd suggest reading the book, doing a group book study, instead.
Was missing review guide...dvds are AWESOME. Received order quickly.

We will start a study using this material Feb. 4 2017. I've wonderful things about this study so fo now the rating is 3 stars
 I will come back with another entry after  a few weeks of the study.
Looking forward to doing this study with our small group.
I am missing the guide for the study. I did receive the 10 books and DVDs. Can't wait to start, please help!

My husband and I go through the Love and Respect video course periodically...whenever I notice I'm returning to some old behaviors...

The first time through, it all seemed like learning French, because we just don't intrinsically know this vitally important information. There was so much I was completely clueless about.

The second time through, I was much more familiar with the "French" and could actually better implement what I was learning. It completely changed the dynamic of our marriage. We now have a beautiful, happy and very contented marriage.

When my husband and I observe others, we notice and talk about the Pink and Blue observations we make.

As a society, it's so easy to follow the relational examples that Hollywood provides...what a devastating mistake that is.

I purchased the course, some time ago, and we just recently went through it for a third time, this time with my parents, who after a few sessions, decided to also purchase the course. It's already opening eyes and beginning to turn things around in their marriage.

I'm most grateful for the Love and Respect video course, and how much it has properly educated us about the differences between Pink and Blue, and how to better understand and interact with one another.

Thank you for that!
Great product. Using it with a small group. Great eye opener.
Very well done! Awesome discussion questions!
